name: Kings
0:
”Alexa, open game of kings!”
”Pick me a card!”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: game of kings
des: Break out this skill at your next party to get the good times started! This skill uses your Amazon Alexa to select each player, one at a time, a card and will instruct them on what to do next. The game ends when a person "cracks the can" and has to finish their drink. Kings is perfect for entertaining and if you do not have a deck of playing cards.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
